languages.text: {n}На губах Кибеллы возникает слабая улыбка.{/n} "Если нечестивцы решат, что твои миры — легкая добыча, это хорошо. Тогда мы найдем в твоих владениях достаточно врагов. И убьем их. Неумирающий воззрится на нас с одобрением".

{n}A faint smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "If the faithless decide that your worlds are easy prey, that is good. We will find enough enemies in your domain, then. And we will kill them. The Undying One will look upon us with approval."
languages.original_text: {n}На губах Кибеллы возникает слабая улыбка.{/n} "Если нечестивцы решат, что твои миры — легкая добыча, это хорошо. Тогда мы найдем в твоих владениях достаточно врагов. И убьем их. Неумирающий воззрится на нас с одобрением".

traits.locale_text: {n}A faint smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "If the faithless decide that your worlds are easy prey, that is good. We will find enough enemies in your domain, then. And we will kill them. The Undying One will look upon us with approval."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A faint smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "If the faithless decide that your worlds are easy prey, that is good. We will find enough enemies in your domain, then. And we will kill them. The Undying One will look upon us with approval."

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈唇边浮现出一丝笑意。{/n}“如果那些不敬之人以为你的世界很容易被掠夺，那实在是再好不过。这样一来，我们就能在你的领土上找到许多敌人。我们会将他们统统杀光，而不死之神会嘉许地看着我们。”
languages.original_text: {n}A faint smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "If the faithless decide that your worlds are easy prey, that is good. We will find enough enemies in your domain, then. And we will kill them. The Undying One will look upon us with approval."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈唇边浮现出一丝笑意。{/n}“如果那些不敬之人以为你的世界很容易被掠夺，那实在是再好不过。这样一来，我们就能在你的领土上找到许多敌人。我们会将他们统统杀光，而不死之神会嘉许地看着我们。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una tenue sonrisa se dibuja en los labios de Kibellah.{/n} «Si los infieles deciden que sus mundos son presa fácil, bienvenidos sean. No faltarán enemigos en sus dominios. Y los mataremos a todos. El Inmortal nos contemplará con satisfacción».
languages.original_text: {n}A faint smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "If the faithless decide that your worlds are easy prey, that is good. We will find enough enemies in your domain, then. And we will kill them. The Undying One will look upon us with approval."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una tenue sonrisa se dibuja en los labios de Kibellah.{/n} «Si los infieles deciden que sus mundos son presa fácil, bienvenidos sean. No faltarán enemigos en sus dominios. Y los mataremos a todos. El Inmortal nos contemplará con satisfacción».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}キベラの唇にうすい笑顔が浮かんだ。{/n}「信仰を持たない者たちが、あなた方の世界が格好の獲物だと判断するなら、それでもよろしいです。あなたの領域には敵が大勢おり、彼らを殺すだけの話です。不死の者は我々を賞賛するでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A faint smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "If the faithless decide that your worlds are easy prey, that is good. We will find enough enemies in your domain, then. And we will kill them. The Undying One will look upon us with approval."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの唇にうすい笑顔が浮かんだ。{/n}「信仰を持たない者たちが、あなた方の世界が格好の獲物だと判断するなら、それでもよろしいです。あなたの領域には敵が大勢おり、彼らを殺すだけの話です。不死の者は我々を賞賛するでしょう」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln umspielt Kibellahs Lippen.{/n} "Wenn die Ungläubigen beschließen, dass Eure Welt eine leichte Beute ist, dann ist das gut. Das heißt, wir finden in Eurem Reich genügend Feinde. Und wir werden sie töten. Der Todlose wird uns in unserem Tun bestärken."
languages.original_text: {n}A faint smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "If the faithless decide that your worlds are easy prey, that is good. We will find enough enemies in your domain, then. And we will kill them. The Undying One will look upon us with approval."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln umspielt Kibellahs Lippen.{/n} "Wenn die Ungläubigen beschließen, dass Eure Welt eine leichte Beute ist, dann ist das gut. Das heißt, wir finden in Eurem Reich genügend Feinde. Und wir werden sie töten. Der Todlose wird uns in unserem Tun bestärken."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un pâle sourire se dessine sur les lèvres de Kibellah.{/n} « Si les infidèles s'imaginent que vos mondes font des proies faciles, tant mieux. Ainsi, nous aurons largement assez d'ennemis au sein de votre seul domaine et nous les exterminerons les uns après les autres. L'Immortel sera content de nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}A faint smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "If the faithless decide that your worlds are easy prey, that is good. We will find enough enemies in your domain, then. And we will kill them. The Undying One will look upon us with approval."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un pâle sourire se dessine sur les lèvres de Kibellah.{/n} « Si les infidèles s'imaginent que vos mondes font des proies faciles, tant mieux. Ainsi, nous aurons largement assez d'ennemis au sein de votre seul domaine et nous les exterminerons les uns après les autres. L'Immortel sera content de nous. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion
